properties.name: looter.batch.chunksize
properties.description: Chunk size used for batch processing in the Looter application

properties.name: atlas.datasource.url
properties.description: Connection URL for the Atlas database

properties.name: atlas.datasource.username
properties.description: Username for connecting to the Atlas database

properties.name: atlas.datasource.password
properties.description: Password for connecting to the Atlas database

properties.name: atlas.datasource.driver-class-name
properties.description: JDBC driver class name for connecting to the Atlas database
